courses.title: Data types and imports
courses.description: Learn about functions, records, sums and how to import other packages.

courses.title: Explore Daml's standard library
courses.description: Take a tour through Daml's standard library and learn about lists, maps, sets and optional data types.

courses.title: Daml Template Authorization
courses.description: Understand the 'signatory', 'observer' and 'controller' keywords and learn how you can write secure and privacy respecting Daml applications.

courses.title: Choices and the Role Pattern
courses.description: Design the API of your application with consuming and non-consuming choices and structure your code with the role pattern.

courses.title: Contract Keys
courses.description: Keep your API clean and simple with contract keys.

courses.title: The Propose/Accept Pattern
courses.description: Use the Propose/Accept pattern to create multi-signatory contracts and delegate authority.
